synopsis.text: Port City, a year after the fourth non-nuclear war, is grappling with the aftershocks of conflict when a self-propelled mine triggers a bombing. Amidst the chaos, a military official entangled in illegal arms deals meets a violent end. As the investigation unfolds, Public Security Section's Daisuke Aramaki crosses paths with Motoko Kusanagi, a cybernetic hacker of unparalleled skill, assigned to the military's clandestine 501st Unit. Suspicion falls on Kusanagi as the potential bomber, courtesy of Batou, a man known for his ever-vigilant eye. Meanwhile, Niihama Prefectural Police's Detective Togusa is immersed in his own twin cases involving a murder and a deceased sex worker. All the while, Motoko remains under the watchful gaze of the 501st Unit's leader, Kurutsu, and his cyborg agents. This thrilling prequel delves into the intricate web of post-war intrigue, cyber warfare, and the enigmatic figure at its center, Motoko Kusanagi.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
